trans-unit.source: After you define the content for an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object, you must add it to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A> collection of an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instance using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Po zdefiniowaniu zawartość <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>obiektu, należy dodać go do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A>Kolekcja <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>wystąpienia przy użyciu <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection.Add%2A>metody.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> cannot be used for recognition until it has been added to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A> collection of an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>Nie może służyć do rozpoznawania, dopóki nie zostało ono dodane do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A>Kolekcja <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>wystąpienia.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection"></xref> class.

Adds the contents of an array of <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule"></xref> objects to the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Dodaje zawartość tablicę <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule"> </xref> obiekty do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection"> </xref> obiektu.

trans-unit.source: The array of rule objects to add to the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Tablica obiektów reguły do dodania do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection"> </xref> obiektu.

trans-unit.source: Any object in the rules array is .
trans-unit.target: Any object in the rules array is .
